thread.title: Pregnant with twins! Beyonce shares a lovely pic of her baby bump!
thread.title_full: Pregnant with twins! Beyonce shares a lovely pic of her baby bump!

title: Pregnant with twins! Beyonce shares a lovely pic of her baby bump!
text: Pin it Share It’s true! Beyonce and Jay Z aka Shawn Corey Carter are having twins and the new mom could not be more excited. She shared a lovely pic on her social networking handle saying, “We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters.” Recommended: Samantha and beau Naga Chaitanya’s musical video will make you emotional! The happy couple are already parents to the adorable 5 year old Blue Ivy. Beyonce had spoken about her pregnancy saying, “Being pregnant was very much like falling in love. You are so open. You are so overjoyed. There’s no words that can express having a baby growing inside of you, so of course you want to scream it out and tell everyone.” Aww! Many congratulations to the happy family!
